reviewText: I bought this for a Grad. School presentation on Tourette's Syndrome. I used the information for part of the written paper and showed the video as part of my  presentation. Received an A+. Great history of the disorder and up-to-date information, including interviews with some extraordinary people who live with Tourette's.

This film interviews actual people who suffer from Tourette Syndrome and how they have been able to cope with this sometimes devasting disorder.

Students are intrigued by the film and find it most informative.
